Detailed Description

Handles the listener from which positioning is calculated

void OgreOggSound::OgreOggListener::setListenerVolume ( ALfloat  vol = 1.0  ) 

Sets the listeners volume.

Remarks:
This sets the global master gain for all sounds heard through the listener.
Parameters:
vol master gain for all sounds. (MUST be positive)
